comments.body:
I'd like to add a flag to control whether to use integral division with the `/` operator:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/25158

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +71,75 @@--   order expression w/ target under ambiguous condition
--   failure NOT expected
SELECT a/2, a/2 FROM test_missing_target
	ORDER BY a/2;
